name: Archive: Stealth
description:
After being snuck into the archives, Bond must do some spywork

Dr. Doak has snuck you into the archive. Knock him out and take the ammo. Right, according to Dr. Doak: Destroy roof mainframe. Take office staff list. Find plans. Destroy storage comms. James, remember to sometimes run away
New stealth system: If guards see you for more than a second they walk to you.If they still see you, they run to you.If they still see you, they shoot you,If the guard hasn't seen you for 10 seconds straight, the guard goes back to normal.
Cough means the guard has seen you and you have x seconds to hide. Sneeze means the guard is back to normal. X music will play if any guard is trying to attack you.
I wish there were more stealth levels for goldeneye. My level isn't so good, but it shows how the stealth systems work.
